snippet: Banyan Branch, Seattle, hired Jennifer Blank Hecht, senior vice president for client services; Erik Arpe, account director; and Stephanie Camp, also an account director.
lead_paragraph: Banyan Branch, Seattle, hired Jennifer Blank Hecht, senior vice president for client services; Erik Arpe, account director; and Stephanie Camp, also an account director.
